review.comment: Thomas Built Homes is one of THE best home builders out there. They are professional, detail oriented, local and super easy to deal with. They add such beautiful finishing touches in their homes all the way from vaulted ceilings with beams, to light fixtures. Any small concern we’ve had in our new build has been rectified immediately with absolutely no stress. I would highly recommend choosing them to either build you a custom home or to purchase an existing build they have done.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for the kind review!  We're grateful to have wonderful customers such as you to build houses for.  Its been nice to see the additional personal touches you have added to truly make it your own.  Enjoy your new home!
